#summary A list of third-party Spam Karma plugins
#labels plugins

= Introduction =

Some people have provided third-party plugins that extend the abilities of Spam Karma

= Plugins =

  * [http://www.sebbi.de/archives/2006/01/31/spam-karma-2-akismet-plugin/ Akismet plugin] -- by Sebbi --use the [http://akismet.com/ Akismet] anti-spam system as just one of the tests within Spam Karma
  * [http://blog.ftwr.co.uk/wordpress/sk2-simple-digest-plugin/ Simple Digest plugin] -- by Peter Westwood -- Sends the blog admin digest emails about recent activity by Spam Karma
  * [http://blog.ftwr.co.uk/wordpress/sk2-moderate-plugin/ Moderate plugin] -- by Peter Westwood -- forces all comments through moderation, regardless of "karma" score.
